The following nbwrpg poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: This poll is designed with the purpose 
to know how many chances do you have 
to post and find the way to do things 
fair, fast and fun to all. How many 
times do you check that are new 
posts??? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Three time by day, 1 votes, 20.00%  
- Two times by day, 1 votes, 20.00%  
- Once by day, 3 votes, 60.00%  
- Once by every two days, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Once every 3 or 4 days, 0 votes, 0.00%  

INDIVIDUAL VOTES

     - airly2002@...
